mapper.select: SELECT uhc.having_coupon_id, uhc.member_id, uhc.coupon_id, uhc.coupon_create_date, uhc.coupon_expiration_date, c.coupon_name, c.coupon_discount_rate FROM user_having_coupon uhc JOIN coupon c ON uhc.coupon_id = c.coupon_id WHERE uhc.member_id = #{memberID};
SELECT coupon_id, coupon_name, coupon_discount_rate, coupon_expiration_date, coupon_status FROM coupon WHERE coupon_id=#{couponID}

SELECT uhc.member_id, uhc.coupon_id AS having_coupon_id, DATE_FORMAT(uhc.coupon_create_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as coupon_create_date, DATE_FORMAT(uhc.coupon_expiration_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS coupon_expiration_date, c.coupon_name, c.coupon_discount_rate, c.coupon_status, uuc.payment_id, uuc.coupon_used_date AS coupon_used_date FROM user_having_coupon uhc JOIN coupon c ON uhc.coupon_id = c.coupon_id LEFT JOIN user_used_coupon uuc ON uhc.member_id = uuc.member_id AND uhc.coupon_id = uuc.coupon_id WHERE uhc.member_id = #{member_id}
